item.title: Cadillac reveals new 'Opulent Velocity' performance EV concept
item.description: GM's new all-electric Cadillac concept car is designed to preview how the automaker plans to keep its high-performance V-Series vehicles relevant for EVs.

item.title: Europe stocks close higher to round off winning week; Sterling gains after slew of UK data
item.description: European stocks close higher as the Stoxx 600 index continued to climb.

item.title: Ford upgrades Lincoln Navigator to include spa mode, 48-inch display for videos and gaming
item.description: The new features come as the automaker has redesigned the exterior and interior of the Lincoln Navigator for the 2025 model year.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire talks paused with resumption planned next week
item.description: Gaza ceasefire talks in Doha were paused on Friday with negotiators set to meet again next week, mediators said.

item.title: B. Riley‚Äôs stock rallies 26% after founder offers to buy rest of troubled bank for $7 a share
item.description: B. Riley Financial Inc.‚Äôs stock rallied 26% on Friday after Bryant R. Riley, the founder, chairman, co-chief executive and largest shareholder of the troubled investment bank, made an offer to buy the stock he doesn‚Äôt already own for $7 a share.

item.title: Private jet flights are down 15% in two years as Covid-era demand wanes
item.description: The industry is grappling with waning demand and a new competitive landscape for high-end travel.

item.title: Bayer shares soar 11% after key U.S. legal win against Roundup cancer claims
item.description: Bayer shares rose as the company said it scored a legal victory in its suit over claims that exposure to its popular Roundup weed killer led to cancer.

item.description: ‚ÄúConsumers vote with their wallets, and household spending overall is still in solid shape,‚Äù one economist noted.

item.title: Harris economic plan features new tax cuts, housing incentives and price caps
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' policies would aim to lower the cost of groceries and prescription drugs, expand affordable housing and cut taxes.

item.title: British fintech Revolut valued at $45 billion in secondary share sale
item.description: British fintech startup Revolut said on Friday that it was valued at $45 billion in a secondary share sale that the company agreed upon with investors.

item.title: Columbia University president resigns months after Israel-Hamas war protests roiled campus
item.description: Columbia University President Minouche Shafik said she resigned on Wednesday, nearly four months after overseeing the university's handling of campus protests over Israel's war in Gaza.
